name: There's no escape
description:
An action FPS where the environment consumes everything.

WASD - Walk

Mouse - Look

Mouse Left - Shoot

Scroll - Adjust Sensitivity

Space - Confirm

Shift - Run

All assets made during ludumdare 49

Textures with Nikon Camera + Materialize (Open Source Tiled Texture Generator)

Music & Sounds made with Ableton Live (drum synth, e-guitar)

Sounds  made with jsfxr

Meshes made with Blender

Made with Unity3d

Thanks for elZach for some utility functions & imprecision shader graph

Fonts: DejaVu & Unifont

You can find the source code & soundtrack on GitHub :)
